item.title: CSS Transitions basics
item.description: End-users interact with your applications via the user interface (UI for short). If everything was designed with the user in mind, the UI will make things very easy for the user. Everything is nice and organized and easy to navigate. Actions are communicated to the user in a friendly way and the user is happy. The sad thing is, state changes in the UI tend to be very abrupt and cold.
